import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update funding sources"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/funding-sources/query/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Bulk-updates funding sources that match the provided filters by applying the fields in the `Update` object to every matching record. Use this to shift status, dates, or allocations across a cohort without editing records one by one.

**Prerequisites**
1. Identify targets with [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) and validate the filters you plan to apply.

**Workflow Example**
1. Run [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) to confirm the target set.
2. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query/update](/docs/api/funding-sources/update-funding-sources-by-query) with `Update` values and `Filters` to scope the change.
3. Verify results with [GET /api/v1.0/funding-sources/\{FundingSourceId\}](/docs/api/funding-sources/get-funding-source-by-id) for a sample of updated records.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `Update` (fields to apply). Provide `Filters` to avoid updating all records.

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Bulk update request with filter criteria and update values","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk updating funding sources matching filter criteria.","properties":{"Update":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Represents a funding source for budget tracking.","properties":{"FundingSourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the funding source."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the funding source."}},"title":"FundingSource"}],"description":"The field values to apply to all matching funding sources.","type":"object"},"Filters":{"type":"array","description":"Filter conditions to select which funding sources to update.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Filter condition for search/list operations. Based on C# `DataFilter` from `Spark.Shared.Models.DataFramework`. Supports both simple filters and nested filter groups.","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Field name or facet to filter on (e.g., 'Status', 'LocationId', 'CreatedDate')"},"Ids":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Array of UUIDs to filter by (for ID-based facets)"},"Values":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Array of string values to filter by"},"Op":{"allOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Filter operations for DataFilter queries. Based on C# `DataFilterOperations` enum from `Spark.Shared.Enums`.","enum":["None","Equal","Greater","Less","GreaterOrEqual","LessOrEqual","StartsWith","EndsWith","Contains","NotEqual","NotGreater","NotLess","NotGreaterOrEqual","NotLessOrEqual"],"x-enum-descriptions":{"None":"No operation specified","Equal":"Equals (eq)","Greater":"Greater than (gt)","Less":"Less than (lt)","GreaterOrEqual":"Greater than or equal (ge)","LessOrEqual":"Less than or equal (le)","StartsWith":"String starts with","EndsWith":"String ends with","Contains":"String contains","NotEqual":"Not equal (ne)","NotGreater":"Not greater than (ng)","NotLess":"Not less than (nl)","NotGreaterOrEqual":"Not greater than or equal (nge)","NotLessOrEqual":"Not less than or equal (nle)"},"title":"DataFilterOperations"}],"description":"Filter operation to apply"},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Custom field type ID (when filtering on custom fields)"},"ComplexEditorPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"JSON path for filtering within complex editor values"},"Items":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":"circular(DataFilter)","description":"Nested filter conditions for complex AND/OR queries"}},"required":["Facet"],"title":"DataFilter"}},"OnlyShowDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, only targets deleted/archived funding sources.","default":false}},"title":"UpdateFundingSourcesRequest"},"example":{"Update":{"FundingSourceStatusTypeId":"d4e5f6a7-b8c9-0123-def0-234567890123"},"Filters":[{"Facet":"EndDate","Value":"2024-12-31T23:59:59Z","FilterType":4}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
